com.explodingbacon.bcnlib.vision

Class Image

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.explodingbacon.bcnlib.vision.Image
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Contour

    public class Image
extends java.lang.Object
    A wrapper class for OpenCV's Mat object.

      • colorRange

        public Image colorRange(java.awt.Color low,
                        java.awt.Color high)
        Sets the color range of this Image. Anything outside this range becomes black.
        Parameters:
        low - The lowest acceptable color.
        high - The highest acceptable color.

      • getMat

        public org.opencv.core.Mat getMat()
        Gets the internal Map of this Image. Should be used when you need functionality not provided by BCNLib, but available in OpenCV.
        Returns:
        The internal Map of this Image.

      • setMat

        public void setMat(org.opencv.core.Mat newMat)
        Sets the internal Map of this Image.
        Parameters:
        newMat - The new Map to be used.

        Returns:
        The new Image.
